thread.section_title: ToursByLocals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ToursByLocals | www.toursbylocals.com
thread.title: Brian Mills

author: Brian Mills
title: Brian Mills
text: Sameh was an excellent guide to our party of 9 adults, taking us to the main sites we had not already visited in Dubai. He is very knowledgeable and told us lots of information about Dubai, the UAE and the private lives of the locals. His English language is excellent, his manners and friendliness are perfect. The vehicle was ideal for 9 plus Sameh and a driver, who was also excellent. We would highly recommend choosing Sameh.
